2007-01-02

The New Year


the new year
(originally uploaded by evetsggod)

I think I'll make it a tradition to post about The New Year every new year. Bradley's Almanac has a couple of songs to download from their performance at The Touch and Go festival earlier this year.



I think album #3 is LONG LONG overdue - and another trip to London is in order!

Lots of other good stuff to listen to on Bradley's Almanac including, if you scroll down this page a bit, Tara Jane O'Neil and Chris Brokaw together and Seam (reunited)!
